20110107070824.000|20110107070825.000|CC1|TO MAKE IT AS IF THEY WERE

20110107070838.000|20110107070840.000|CC1|FROM THE PERSON WHO MAILED TO   
20110107070840.000|20110107070851.000|CC1|ACOUPLE INCENDIARY DEVICES.

20110107070852.000|20110107070853.000|CC1|THEM AND ONE PERSON SUFFERED    
20110107070853.000|20110107070856.000|CC1|MINOR FINGER BURNS.
